name: Camilla
text: The staff at the riad is fantastic! Lots of great info om what to do and see in Marrakech. We took a cooking class and had such a nice expierence. In the evening we had a great dinner will very good service and fantastic table setting!

name: Jamie
text: Abdul is a MASTER at setting a table it brought peace to my OCD. Halima and the lemon chicken Tajin amazing The three ladies and their amazing cleanliness And graciousness and the breakfast bounty they prepared Azzedine good old fashion knowledge of the Médina Nadia and her fabulous hospitality and chic decor The ONLY place I will stay in Marrakech! Everyone at the hotel is beyond gracious! I felt at home.

name: Pedro
text: The rooftop has a amazing sunset view from the Medina. Azdine and Abdu were perfect and made me few at home. Would definitely come back at Riad Ilayka

name: Ben
text: This is an exceptional find. It was wonderfully quiet and civilised right in the heart of the city with sunbeds on a balcony for when one wanted a bit of rest and recuperation. Aside from the quality of the hotel it was a rare home from home experience with staff that went above and beyond to make our stay fantastic. Of partcular note were the restaurant recommendations, so whether you have done your homework or not fear not you are in for a treat. One day we hope to be back but in the meantime a very strong recommendation.

name: Philip
text: Very nice rooms, beautifully equipped in Moroccan style. Cozy 7 room riad with super friendly staff. Within 10 minute walking distance to almost all major attractions, if you can find your way. Jacuzzi on roof in stead of swimming pool was more than good enough for a refreshing dip in stead of swimming. Dinner and breakfast were awesome.

name: Vivian
text: Absolutely 5 star, top notch service and accommodations! Researched numerous hotel options in Marrakesh and by far, Riad Ilayka was the best in terms of the exceptional quality of the accommodations, phenomenal level of service and ideal location. As someone who has traveled to over 200 countries, the extremely high level of customer service we enjoyed during our stay really stood out in my mind. I reached out to the hotel prior to my arrival to assist with booking a COVID test and Nadia went above and beyond to research options, schedule my appointment and ensure I received my results even after I had checked out. They truly take care of all of you and are highly attentive to your needs. The Riad is perfectly located in the old medina and just steps away from the famous square. Even though you’re steps away from the center of action, the Riad is located in a small side street that provides peace and quiet and was a perfect oasis. Each room is unique and decorated beautifully in a traditional style and you really feel that you’re having an authentic experience. There’s a wonderful roof top with a hot tub and fantastic views – the perfect place to unwind after a day of sightseeing and activities. I can’t emphasize enough how attentive and caring the staff was – ready to accommodate your every need. The courtyard is just beautiful and a lovely place to have breakfast, tea and just relax. While there are a multitude of options available in Marrakesh, guarantee a wonderful stay for yourself by booking at Riad Ilayka – you will truly be impressed and your expectations will be exceeded! Thank you for an experience of a lifetime!

name: Julia
text: My experience was beyond expectations - this hotel offers everything you need in Marrakech: amazing breakfast, perfect location, immaculate service… nothing could be better. Staff was among the best I have seen. I enjoyed my stay A LOT!

name: Arthur
text: Elegant, exquisite decoration, professional hosting. You cannot find a hotel like this in anywhere in Europe. I researched over 200 riads in Morocco, this one is the top choice.

name: Aurelio
text: This was probably one of the most amazing experience during our stay in Marrakech! I wish there was a word to describe how phenomenal the staff was, the riad was impeccable, you can smell how clean everything is, all the small details from the bathroom to your room is mind blowing! Having a chef in the riad to cook for you amazing delicious meals worth a million dollars this was a plus! Can’t hardly wait to go back! Thank you to everyone, I am very thankful and humble. They will make you feel like part of their family, I can probably continue writing a full page of how wonderful this place is, but now is your turn to experience a magical place in Marrakech! I highly recommend this amazing property near mostly everything important around the old town in Marrakech! Cheers

name: Jane
text: What can I say? Probably one of the best accommodations we have stayed in. Everything and I mean everything was just perfect. The Riad is found down a winding alley and upon entering you are immediately invited in to a beautiful calm courtyard with trees, soft music playing and birds singing all around you. You are welcomed with mint tea and homemade biscuits then shown to your room and wow was my first reaction, dark wood panelling adorns the walls and although the decor is dark it is very luxurious and romantic. The terrace upstairs has seating, sunbeds, a little pool which unfortunately we never tried and up some further stairs is a little pergola with more seating and views across the rooftops of the city. Breakfast is served around the courtyard and very generous with freshly squeezed juices { different ones each day!}, tea or coffee, eggs, yoghurt and many different breads and cakes. But without a doubt the thing that makes this Riad special are the staff, the service is outstanding. Their warmth, friendliness and genuine wish to help in any way they can to make your holiday memorable is something I will never forget. We were not only given advice on how to get to places of interest we were actually chaperoned on a couple of occasions. I want to thank everyone at Riad Ilayka for making our first trip to Marrakech totally unforgettable and ensuring we will come again. xxx

name: Xuan
text: Nabila the hotel owner is the highlight of the trip. Very elegant and helpful. The hotel is decorated with great taste. Very good breakfast. I had a very pleasant stay in this beautiful gem hotel

name: Panait
text: Everything was excellent! Mrs. Nadia , Mohamed and all the personal was amazing! Definitely we will return here ! Big applauses !

name: Gail
text: The Riad is ideally located in the souk but is a quiet, beautiful haven away from the hustle and bustle. A side door down an alleyway opens up into the most beautiful reception area and courtyard which is covered by mandarin trees. All the staff are exceptionally friendly and couldn't be more helpful. The breakfasts offered a huge variety of choice from healthy smoothies, glasses of strawberrys, light omlettes along with traditional breads and cakes. Evening meals were 3 course, traditional, very reasonably priced and prepared freshly by the cooks. There was even an option to request a personalised menu. The bedrooms are traditional Morroccan, clean and with comfortable beds. There was free use of a digital safe.

name: Carol
text: The staff were wonderful. They really looked after us. The location was good.

name: Vanessa
text: A paradise, all wonderful, beautiful structure in luxury Moroccan style. Extremely polite and helpful staff, all with attention to the smallest details and clean. Excellent location, quiet although in the center of the Medina. Abundant and excellent breakfast. In addition there is a relaxing courtyard and a rooftop for viewing the city from above and the mountains. High quality to return absolutely.

name: Stefano
text: Everything. From the great welcome that was given us at our arrival, to the super tasty breakfast that was served every morning. The room was superb, definitely the best I could wish for my stay in Marrakech! There is definitely a reason why they have been nominated one of the best Riad in Marrakech!

name: Monika
text: Everyone at the Riad ILayka ,did more than there Best ,to make us feel at home . The Riad is beautiful decorated . Everything is very clean The Airport pick up ,was so convenient Once we arrived, they made sure , you feel comfortable walking outside the Riad ,and not getting lost . Thank you so much for the , extra service . The Dinner we had ,at the Riad , was very delicious 👌 I miss there Breakfast already 😭 If you want something ,they all go , out of there way ,to please you . We travel a lot ,but we never ,ever experienced such a , out of this World Customer service 👍 Can't wait to to go back and get pampered again 😄👍

name: Samreen
text: Honest, lovely people working here who give you really good tips to get around; their awesome Chef cooks a mean tagine for dinner; well-maintained and clean; close/walking distance to the markets but still away from the noise; beautiful rooms with comfy beds; delicious and massive breakfast and dinner; nice hangout areas on the terrace and patios... I could go on!

name: Margaret
text: Exquisite traditional Riad ,beautifully furnished , very comfortable and right in the heart of the Medina. The hospitality of the wonderful staff was exceptional. We loved eating our delicious breakfast and tagine dinner in the inner courtyard with its fruit trees and birds. It made for the perfect Marrakech experience

name: Ray
text: The location is ideal and the roof top views for sunrise and sunset are great and unobtrusive with other buildings or people. Our room was large and comfortable. There is no tv. So be prepared with a good book. Wifi works well for streaming movies however. Staff was very friendly and courteous. Breakfast was very nice, mostly carbohydrates, not much protein such as eggs and bacon. But the yogurt is really delicious. As well as the fresh squeezed orange juice. No elevator as well. If you don’t mind a few steep stairs, request the second floor for it is somewhat quieter. Not that the rooms on the ground floor are very loud, but there is some relief from the main patio for privacy and people’s conversation at meal time.

name: Bridget
text: Beautiful, peaceful and historic riad. Very friendly staff, nothing was too much trouble. Fantastic lunch and dinner and big choice for breakfast. Beautiful romantic setting. Will defiantely go back.

name: David
text: The Riad was a nice respite from the craziness of Marrakesh. The property is lovely and the staff did a good job of making us comfortable. The courtyard is beautiful and the room was comfortable. I would stay here again.

name: Fares
text: Magnifique i will back sure

name: Samantha
text: We chose Riad Ilayka because we wanted a more authentically decorated room. In looking through the many, many riads in the Medina, most had beautiful courtyards, but then the individual rooms were decorated like any generic hotel room. The rooms at Riad Ilayka were beautiful, comfortable, but also made us feel we were really in Morocco the entire time. Breakfast at the riad was a highlight, as was the staff, who all went above and beyond for us. We can't recommend it highly enough!

name: Vincint
text: Very beautifully built and decorated Riad. Rooms are very comfy. Staff very friendly and ready to help. And dinner and breakfast were excellent !

name: Joanne
text: This Riad is in a perfect location in the middle of everything yet tucked away. The breakfasts were delicious and the roof terrace very private but most of all the staff made it feel like a home rather than a hotel. I am sure you can stay in fancier places but the total package here is great.

name: Quantaise
text: Where do I begin?! We really wanted to get an authentic feel of Morocco but we're worried about service. We read up and decided to go with a Riad. It's basically a small mansion with a few rooms. And we did not expect the AMAZING luxury service that we got at Riad Ilayka! Mohammed the manager was always so helpful with whatever we asked. He set us up with a private cooking class at the Riad! We then had our meal served to us for dinner in a beautiful presentation! Our room was always clean when we got back from site seeing and you can tell they take great pride in keeping the Riad itself in amazing condition. We made friends with a few others staying at the Riad and truly felt as if the staff were family. I highly recommend Riad Ilayka and will be back soon to visit!

name: Sara
text: The property is a family structure with 7 rooms, all in traditional Moroccan style. The Riad is located 5 minutes walking from the main square walking through the souk, in a quiet area. The rooms are clean and the staff was able to make our stay just perfect, from planning dinner to cooking class and excursions/transfers.

name: Laurabates
text: The ambiance, the fantastic service, the view from the roof terrace

name: Kevin
text: Staff

name: Vilius
text: Everything was exeptional

name: Stuart
text: Amazing location , superb staff and clean modern rooms.

name: Torsten
text: At Riad Ilyaka we felt at home in the otherwise bustling Médina. The entire staff from the management team to the concierge gentlemen are committed to providing a comfortable stay. It is clear that the team prides itself on offering a 360-degree experience. Azeddine was the highlight for us. He is a gentle-soul with a warm smile who goes the extra mile without expecting anything in return. This is superb service. We recommend organizing excursions, tours or inquiring at the Riad, as they validate legitimacy. The best part about staying in a Riad is the authentic cultural experience. You do have take a few turns in the alleyways to find the entrance, but the staff offers to help navigate until you feel comfortable with the route. At no point did we ever feel unsafe. There is only one way in and out, with a bolted door which the staff controls. At night there is a security guard outside a hostel in the alleyway which also keeps an eye on any traffic. The rooftop is also locked down late at night for extra security. A safe is provided in the room. On our last evening, the staff organized a private cooking class. We had so much fun shopping in the market hall and picking the spices. The chefs talked us through every step so that we can recreate the dishes at home. The tagine we made was the best we had!

name: Lisa
text: The staff are very friendly, nothing is a problem. Great position and the rooms are gorgeous

name: Tosin
text: The Moroccan tea was so good

name: Katherine
text: The room was perfectly curated and gorgeous. Staff were super helpful. It's in the middle of the medina but so quiet and peaceful.

name: Willem
text: Friendly people, traditional Maroccan Riad.

name: David
text: The location was difficult. Unfortunately our room assigned was being ripped apart due to a water leak and they wanted to move us from one room to the next under construction We had booked 2 rooms one for us and the other for our son and his fiancé and because of the noise and the inconvenience they were going to still charge us the 400 euro if we canceled both rooms we stayed and were givena free faboulous dinner for the situation. We previously stayed and will recommend the Riad Palais Sebban Absolutely faboulous Magnificant Riad for the same cost You will love your stay

name: Katie
text: Really friendly staff and the food (especially dinner) is delicious. The bed was comfortable and the rooftop was an oasis from the city madness.

name: Anonymous
text: Super friendly and helpful staff. Great location. Quiet and peaceful.

name: Anonymous
text: Excellent location，Excellent Decoration， excellent service， extremely Cleaning. I wish I will come back again soon！

name: Anonymous
text: Staff & Hospitality - Biggest winning point. Nadira, Mohammed, Abdel, Reda - they all are fantastic. Food - Amazing. The tagines, morning breakfast, big salad, Moroccan cooked salad - all were fresh, served plentiful. Riad's Patio, breakfast area, terrace. When we arrived in the Riad we were welcomed with a fresh juice and biscuits and there was renovation work going on in the ground floor. Nadira was kind enough to upgrade us to a superior suite in the first floor for a day.

name: Anonymous
text: Central location, lovely staff and beautiful building.

name: Anonymous
text: Everything was perfect although it took us 'a while' to locate the Riad, its a quiet and peaceful asset. Staffs are extremely friendly and helpful all the time, our room was kept nice and tidy, breakfast was refreshing, and, we loved the rooftop, we enjoyed sunset up there. I would also strongly recommend the in-house dinner (250MAD/person), dessert was absolutely AMAZING!!!! and dont forget to try the mint tea!

name: Rui
text: Simpatia do staff, localização.

name: Carlos
text: tem o ambiente de um palacete árabe com uma decoração de bom gosto em todos seus detalhes . o ponto alto porém é a atenção dos funcionários e proprietária

name: Oleg
text: Потрясающе красивый риад. Очень радушные, заботливые сотрудники , гостеприимство на высшем уровне. Шикарные завтраки , возможность выйти на террасу , полежать позагорать на лежаках, освежиться в маленьком бассейне и насладиться невероятными видами. При этом недалеко от выхода из Медины , тихий проулок.

name: Gabriele
text: Das Riad ist ein typisches marokkanisches Riad, mit kleinen schönen Details. mit liebevoll eingerichteten Möbel, aber kein grosser Schnick Schnack

name: Julia
text: Gostei de tudo! o Riad é super limpo, quando você entra parece ter entrado em um oásis, o café da manhã é muito bom e completo e o serviço é ótimo! Todos são muito atenciosos!

name: Iuliia
text: Риад нереальной красоты. Ок, как калоритное произведение искусства. Номер - просто сказка. Чистота безупречная. Персонал исключительный. Я приехала с тура по Сахаре ночью. За мной пришли на стоянку и встретили. Они действительно заботятся о своих гостях и окружают заботой и вниманием. Завтраки очень вкусные и сервируются, как для королевских особ. Без преувеличения. Очень благодарна за все. Вы лучшие❤

name: Stéphanie
text: L accueil rempli de chaleur humaine et de bienveillance de la part de chacun et de tous. Les Bons conseils de Nadia Un riad rempli d authenticité Un service au top et très attentionné A recommande vivement

name: Ibrahim
text: كل شي في هذا الرياض ساحر من الساحه للغرفه والموظفين اضافوا سحر اخر عبدالحق ونور الدين والموظفات ولا سيما الاخت ناديه التي وزعت الورود في كل الرياض ليضيف الذوق واللطف مع الضيوف شكرا جزيلا ولنا عوده باذن الله

name: Maira
text: Ļoti labas brokastis ar svaigām sulām un augļiem.

name: Réda
text: Tout

name: Roberto
text: O serviço foi impecável. O lugar é muito bonito. Não ter tevê, nem frigobar traz muita calma ao hóspede.

name: Isabelle
text: Le personnel est vraiment au petit soin du touriste, plein de petites attentions, dans une ambiance des milles et une roses, nous y retournerons très probablement.

name: Roger-alexandre
text: L’accueil, Nadia la propriétaire et toute l’équipe qui veille sur nous étaient juste parfaits. Toujours présents quand on a besoin mais une présence discrète. Vous pouvez vous fier les yeux fermés à toutes les recommandations qu’ils pourront vous faire. Le Ryad est sublime et dans le vrai goût de ce qu’on attend à Marrakech. Beaux matériaux, agréable patio et très belle décoration. De nombreuses terrasses et des espaces de tranquillité un peu partout. Vue imprenable sur l’Atlas, les toits de la médina. Le soir, niché dans le petit kiosque surplombant la terrasse, la frénésie de la place Jemaa El Fna se laisse deviner avec les bruits des tambourins au loin. Magique. L’emplacement est juste parfait. Le meilleur quartier de la Médina : assez près de la place mais suffisamment loin pour profiter des souks plus typiques. Pour finir, la cuisine est délicieuse. Le petit déjeuner est très copieux et dans la tradition marocaine, le tout servi avec les oiseaux sous les orangers. Le soir, le tajine et le couscous de Alima sont à tomber parterre, sans parler des entrées, briouates et desserts! (prévoyez quand même une petite balade dans les souks pour la digestion! D’autant plus que le quartier est très agréable lorsque les boutiques commencent à se vider et se fermer). For the one who doesn’t speak french, as a frequent traveller to Marrakech, please don’t hesitate to book this wonderful Ryad, clearly one of the best. Everything is perfect. Un grand merci à Nadia, Abdul, Azzedine, Mohamed, Reda, Alima et toutes filles de l’ombre qui prennent soin du Ryad ainsi que le jardinier! A très vite! Roger-Alexandre et Maria

name: Dirk
text: Ausgezeichnete Lage, mitten in der Médina und sehr zuvorkommende Mitarbeiter...

name: Maria
text: El Riad es precioso y está a cinco minutos de la plaza principal. El desayuno es fantástico y todo el personal es muy amable. Un hotel para los que quieren un poco más.

name: Raul
text: Nos alojamos en el Riad del 4 al 7 y nos fuimos a otro Riad y no nos gustó nada. Decidimos perder el Dinero y regresar al Riad Ilayka donde no había color con el otro Riad. Agradecidos de poder encontrar disponibilidad. Es una maravilla de lugar que recomendamos sin dudarlo. Hemos estado a gusto durante toda la estancia y nos marchamos con mucha pena. El personal atentos, encantadores y se desviven para que sus clientes estuvieran a gusto. El Riad es limpio, las habitaciones muy bonitas y decoradas con mucho gusto, las camas súper cómodas, el baño precioso y no faltaba detalle. La wifi funcionaba muy bien en todo el Riad, el desayuno completo. Tuvieron un súper detalle con mi mujer por su cumpleaños. Os recomiendo cenar o comer en el Riad. Es riquísimo. Mucho mejor que muchos restaurantes donde estuvimos y que no eran nada baratos. Gracias Nadia, Gracias Simo, Abdou y gracias a todo el staff del Riad. Os echaremos de menos. Abrazos, Raúl y Fatiha

name: Raul
text: El Riad fue un acierto total. Es precioso, decorado con mucho gusto, limpio, cerca de todo y muy tranquilo. Se respira mucha paz. La dueña y el personal del Riad se desviven para que te sientas como en casa. Nos encanto

name: Joel
text: UNE NUIT C EST TROP COURT ENDROIT .TRES BIEN .

name: Gustavobsp
text: Experiência incrível de hospedagem em plena medina de Marrakech. Atendimento impecável, com equipe extremamente solícita. Quarto excelente e decorado com muito bom gosto, proporcionando, em conjunto com as demais comodidades do Rhiad uma hospedagem única. Recomento fortemente!

name: Michele
text: Struttura molto curata nei minimi dettagli, personale sempre gentile e disponibile. Colazione abbondante e freschissima. Tutto perfetto. Anche per rilassarsi dopo una giornata tra le vie della Medina ed i souk. Abbiamo anche cenato nel Riad una sera. Cena romantica e deliziosa. Complimenti a tutto lo staff .

name: Michael
text: Das Riad ILayka ist eine der schönsten Unterkünfte, in der wie je verweilen durften. Man entflieht dem bunten und wuseligen Treiben der Stadt und findet sich in einer wahren Wohlfühloase wieder. Das Personal ist super freundlich, total aufmerksam und herzlich zuvorkommend. Man fühlt sich pudelwohl und kann auf der Dachterrasse zu jeder Tageszeit entspannte Stunden verbringen. Eine absolute Empfehlung ist auch der Kochkurs, an dem wir zu zweit teilgenommen haben. Macht echt Spaß und man erfährt Einiges über Küche, Land und Leute. Einen Aufenthalt im Riad ILayka wird niemand bereuen. Ganz im Gegenteil: Er bleibt unvergessen! :)

name: Roberto
text: El servicio, la comida, las habitaciones , todo está increíble ! Una decoración fabulosa

name: Waldemar
text: Śniadanie znakomite, miejsce znakomite. Piękny obiekt, obsługa w miłej, rodzinnej atmosferze. Zdecydowanie polecam.

name: Krzysiek
text: Piękny dziedziniec gdzie serwuje się pyszne śniadania, stylowe wnętrza, bardzo miły i pomocny personel.

name: Maria
text: La tranquil.litat que ofereix dins el bullici de la medina. La terrassa i el pati.

name: Rachele
text: Colazione accoglienza e disponibilità dello staff. Struttura bella e curata

name: Markus
text: Das Riad wird mit sehr viel Liebe geführt. Jedes Detail ist aufeinander abgestimmt. Das gesamte Team ist sehr herzlich und immer hilfsbereit. Wir waren mit unserem 7 Monate alten Sohn zu Gast. Alle haben sich so liebevoll um ihn gekümmert.

name: Pierre
text: Très beau Riad, excellente cuisine et emplacement. Le personnel est fantastique.merci Nadia

name: Pablo
text: Excelente servicio a la llegada, te hacen sentir como en casa, incluso nos dieron check in un poco antes y nos acompañaron a la medina para que no nos perdiéramos.

name: Valter
text: Servizio impeccabile

name: Hussain
text: كان رياض ألايكا ممتاز وتعيش كانك في زمن وتاريخ اهل المغرب القداما و البلده القديمه تحس فيها كأنك في سوق ماقبل التكنولوجيا وصاحبه رياض ألايكا الأستاذة ناديه وموظفين الفندق يحسسونك كأنك ضيف في بيتهم وتعيش معاهم الكرم المغربي الأصيل

name: Giovanni
text: Accoglienza personale attento cordiale e qualificato complimenti davvero

name: Judith
text: Ontzettend aardig en behulpzaam personeel. Staan dag en nacht klaar en ze spreken super goed engels.

name: Cristina
text: Posizione ottima Giardino bellissimo Terrazza accogliente e con idromassaggio Staff gentilissimo davvero Colazione super

name: Nicolas
text: Riad exceptionnel au goût exquis, très paisible et confortable. Situation parfaite. Un staff d’une gentillesse exceptionnelle et aux petits soins des clients. Tout fut parfait. Merci Exceptional Riad tastefully decorated, very comfortable and quiet. Perfect location. Staff incredibly helpful, with exceptional kindness. They took care of us every moments. Everything was perfect. Thank you

name: Edouard
text: Personnel aux petits soins

name: Laura
text: Meraviglioso riad molto accogliente e pulito. Staff davvero gentile! La cena a base di cucina marocchina da provare!!! Un’oasi di relax e quiete in mezzo alla confusione della piazza Super!!!

name: Inma
text: El riad es precioso y la atención del servicio es inmejorable. Simo es encantador nos ayudó en todo al igual que el resto del personal. Nos ofrecieron traslado desde el aeropuerto lo cuál es una gran ayuda a la hora de llegar por primera vez a la Medina. A destacar el desayuno, es espectacular. La habitación silenciosa y la cama muy cómoda. Deseando volver.

name: Uglia
text: La amabilidad de todo el personal. La ubicación dentro del Zoco. Y un capítulo aparte se lo lleva el desayuno: excelente y super abundante!!!

name: Marco
text: Fantastische locatie midden in de oude stad. Middels steegjes en kleine straatjes kom je in de Riad aan. Uiterst vriendelijk personeel met een hoog service level. Dakterras is heerlijk met 6 grote ligstoelen en diverse zitjes. Uitzicht is fantastisch. Er is een waterbad waar je in kunt zitten met maximaal 3 personen, maar dit stelt weinig voor. Ontbijt is super uitgebreid met verse streekproducten. Diner is ook een aanrader, er wordt een goed 3 gangen diner verzorgd op aanvraag (lokale gerechten). Wel moet je dit op tijd aangeven, zodat de kok tijdig verse producten kan inkopen en zich kan voorbereiden. Bij het Riad kun je ook de transfer regelen naar de luchthaven en excursies boeken, wij hebben dit gedaan en is zeker aan te bevelen. Kortom een top Riad met uiterst vriendelijk personeel die het jou echt naar de zin wil maken.

name: Robert
text: Superontbijt. Heel vriendelijk personeel. Goede ligging

name: Carmen
text: Muy agradable la estancia,el personal muy amable y atento, desayuno muy rico y la cena también muy buena

name: Said
text: Riad sorti tout droit des mille et une nuits!

name: Mmrak
text: Ein großartiges Frühstück und auf Wunsch auf ein tolles Abendessen. Die Tajine war großartig! Das Personal sehr freundlich und immer um uns bemüht. Wir waren zum zweiten Mal dort und sicher nicht zum letzten Mal.

name: Muriel
text: Le Riad était magnifique, le personnel au petit soin, la décoration magique, les repas succulents,... Notre voyage nous laissera éternellement un goût magique et des étoiles plein les yeux. Merci à Khaoula, Abdel, la talentueuse cuisinière de l'établissement,... Que du positif pour nous, encore merci. Muriel et Claudy Jamart

name: Jordi
text: sin duda el personal, muy atentos en todo.

name: Anonymous
text: Emplacement au coeur de la médina. Les chambres sont d'une propreté irréprochable et le personnel d'une grande gentillesse et disponibilité. Petit déjeuner copieux et varié.
